title: Held Together By Love: On the Discarded Image and the Medieval Model with Richard Rohlin
description:
I have a fantastic conversation with the extremely knowledgable Medievalist Richard Rohlin. We speak about the book "The Discarded Image" by CS Lewis, on the Medieval model for viewing the world

listen to the podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Held-Together-By-Love-On-the-Discarded-Image-and-the-Medieval-Model-with-Richard-Rohlin-e10t5mc

Richard's Tolkien podcast: https://www.ancientfaith.com/podcasts/amonsul?fbclid=IwAR1mjPqCRMw5g5rCUmcXN76d2sIw1uPIS5XjzfwL8vsXQs4DCXd5C6Q8B5Y

Richard's book: https://www.amazon.com/Amid-Weeping-There-Joy-Perspectives/dp/1951536126?fbclid=IwAR2svSjzvGSRbWtgecgr1anGFndH-2NJvTPbIBKjQ9PryfvDY1QEwHcg5Gs

follow me on twitter @andrealynnlewis 
email me at andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
